mapper.select: select id, title, stock, line_price as linePrice, sale_price as salePrice from scenic_ticket where deleted = false and platform_state = 2 and end_date > now() and scenic_id = #{scenicId} order by id desc
mapper.update: update scenic_ticket set stock = stock + #{num}, sale_num = sale_num - #{num}, total_num = total_num - #{num} where id = #{id} and stock + #{num} >= 0 and deleted = false and platform_state = 2
